means: 表示兴奋激动的心情时的叫声

sentence.Network_en: Big whoopee! I've had all the Kenny dolls months.

sentence.Network_cn: 了不起喔! 所有的肯尼玩偶,我好几个月前就已经有了.

jx.jx_en_mean: To engage in a noisy, boisterous celebration.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 欢庆，欢闹：参加嘈杂，喧闹的庆祝

entry.tran: (非常开心或激动时的感叹语)哈哈
entry.def: People sometimes shout 'whoopee' when they are very happy or excited.

example.ex: I can have a lie in tomorrow. Whoopee!
example.tran: 我明天能睡懒觉了，哈哈！
